pages.text: Werewolves, are vicious creatures. Hidden by day, ferocious at a full moon. These creatures look like ordinary everday people until the full moon, when they transform into a blood thirsty beast and kill anything on sight.

Don't ever let one bite you, for if you get bitten by a werewolf, you will more likely contract the curse and become yourself a werewolf. There are no symptoms or a way of telling if you've contracted the curse so becareful!

There are ways of dealing with them, for one, they avoid Aconite as it's toxic to them and you can also right click on other humans to check if they're are werewolves. They are also weak to anything silver! So make sure you have some at hand. There's also rumoured to be a book for people afflicted with lycanthropy in towns.
